name: cookie pop jam - new cake games
name_original: cookie pop jam - new cake games
description:
Welcome to this new puzzle and brain game, the new cookie pet is a very addictive match 3 game, and exciting match3 puzzle games that will keep entertaining for hours and for free.

If you love cooking games and enjoy the match 3 puzzle games? Do you like cookies and candies ? Do you like challenge?
You will keeping playing this puzzle game for hours and hours without be boring.

It is a very easy to learn and to play you just have match 3 or more the cookies pet in the same colors all the same candies, use your brain to do very good combination and make good score, and a lot of coins.

With this game you can easily improve your brain and intelligence, and concentration.

Are you ready to find delicious cookies at your kitchen and use all your concentration and your brain power to discover the world of cooking games.

HOW TO PLAY
• Simply swipe your finger over a the cookie with same colors or the same candies.
• use your brain to do very good combination and make good score, and a lot of coins.
• Use the cookie power up if you are stack of you dont find a way to complete the level.
• use the restore button to restore your no ads purchase and disable the ads

FEATURES
• Learn how to cook with this cooking game of match 3.
• Discover hidden levels in your big cooking adventure
• Graphic and Visuals are pleasing to play cookies in various kinds!
• Feel achievement with Increased point by making more cookies!
• Simple and Easy!
• Great exercise for the brain and concentration
• Support both iPhone and iPad
• FREE Update!
• Many levels to play and discover, and more will ve added in the coming updates!
• Easy to learn and fun to master gameplay
• Enjoy game for any time, anywhere and a short time.
• Easy and fun play
• Enjoy game for any time, anywhere and a short time with no time limit, you can play online or offline with or without internet connection or without Wifi.

Stay tuned for coming updates.

Thanks for playing!
